title.u: How to subtract using the calculator

shortdesc.i: Here you will find the instruction of subtraction feature in JPS calculator app.

li.i: Ensure you have accurate information on your monthly income and expenses.
Have a calculator application installed and ready to use on your device.
Allocate some uninterrupted time to complete the task effectively.

context.i: Create a monthly budget plan by calculating your income, expenses, and savings using a calculator application.

cmd.i: Subtract the total monthly expenses from the total monthly income.
Enter the total income amount into the calculator, press the "-" button, and enter the total expense amount.
Press the "=" button to get the monthly savings amount.

result.i: The result from the subtraction is displayed.

p.i: Total Monthly Income: $5,000 Total Monthly Expenses: $3,500

li.i: Enter the total income amount, which is $5,000.
Enter the total expense amount, which is $3,500.

example.p: Result: The calculator application will display the monthly savings, which in this case is $1,500. Therefore, the monthly savings from the given example is $1,500.
